alert.note: Alert for Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 12:30AM CDT until May 25 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LUBBOCK...NORTHEASTERN HOCKLEY...SOUTHWESTERN HALE AND SOUTHERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Halfway to 6 miles south of Anton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Anton, Amherst, Cotton Center, Fieldton, Spade and Whitharral. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are capable of producing widespread wind damage across southeast Lamb county. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
